name: Text Buddy - An Email and Text Enhancement App - Emojis, Emoticons, Characters, & More!
name_original: Text Buddy - An Email and Text Enhancement App - Emojis, Emoticons, Characters, & More!
description:
TextBuddy enhances your texts, emails, tweets, Facebook posts, and more!

ⓦⓡⓘⓣⓔ ⓘⓝ ⓑⓤⓑⓑⓛⓔⓢ! Write upside down! TextBuddy converts your text to crazy text!

What you get: Emoji Keyboard Installer, Full Emoji List, Full Emoticons List, Character Library, and much more!

Thousands of Emojis, Emoticons, Symbols, and Characters are available with TextBuddy! (2,000+)

Use TextBuddy to set up and install your Emoji Keyboard when texting, emailing, tweeting, or updating Facebook, or copy and paste directly using the TextBuddy copy page!

TextBuddy Features:
- iPhone, iPad, iPod touch compatible
- Graphics designed for Retina displays - no fuzziness
- Available for iOS 5.1+
